trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de eventos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controlo alterar a posição da anotação.

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs é utilizada para os eventos de posicionamento de anotação dois, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, além de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>propriedade obtém o objeto de anotação está a ser posicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe também contém as propriedades que obtêm a nova localização, a largura, a localização de altura e âncora de anotação que está a ser reposicionada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Annotation property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de anotação permite ao programador definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>Propriedades durante o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova localização da âncora da anotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto que representa a posição da âncora de novo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova localização de X do ponto de âncora de anotação.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationX property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>eventos são gerados, a propriedade NewAnchorLocationX determina a coordenada X do que a anotação nova.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: Esta informação é útil quando a anotação está ancorada recentemente para um ponto de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a nova localização de X do ponto de âncora de anotação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova localização de Y do ponto de âncora de anotação.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationY property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos são gerados, a propriedade NewAnchorLocationY determina a coordenada Y novo da anotação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: Esta informação é útil quando a anotação está ancorada recentemente para um ponto de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a nova localização de Y do ponto de âncora de anotação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova X coordenada localização da anotação.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationX property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos são gerados, a propriedade NewLocationX define a localização de coordenada X da anotação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o novo X coordenada localização da anotação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Y novo da localização de anotação.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationY property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos são gerados, a propriedade NewLocationY define a coordenada Y de localização da anotação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a novo coordenada Y da localização de anotação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova localização e o tamanho da anotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura da anotação novo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeHeight property to determine the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos são gerados, utilize a propriedade de NewSizeHeight para determinar a altura da anotação nova.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações podem ser utilizadas quando redimensionar a anotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a novo altura da anotação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do novo da anotação.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeWidth property to determine the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>eventos são gerados, utilize a propriedade de NewSizeWidth para determinar a largura novo da anotação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações podem ser utilizadas quando redimensionar a anotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a novo largura da anotação.
